titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 483) to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to permit medicare select policies to be offered in all States, and for other purposes.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 69.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 104-169, by Ms. Pryce.

Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 483 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions. Providing for the consideration of the in the House. Upon adoption of the conference report, S. Con. Res. 19 shall be considered as agreed to by the House.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/29/1995--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 483 (permitting Medicare select policies to be offered in all States).
